As the bullet strikes the bottom of it, it bends upward, closing off part of its passageway, and locking off the other half with ice, seemingly holding it for the time being. While you're reloading, I need you to go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about these jewels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Feast gives you advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Feast gives me advantage, well, but it doesn't stack, right? I rolled a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a 16? All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a good thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull your hand out of the switch, Sylas's gaze pierces into your eyes, and your blades, before you have a moment to notice, have already sheathed themselves, and you step into the room alongside the two of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Break the jewels!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this crux moment in her where there's this inner conflict within her right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take a swing at the jewel that I was holding my hand over?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to get my second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quickly, he's going to get his next shot here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Reload, second shot. 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. As you fire the second, it ricochets off the bronze nearby. The liquid begins to pour in now. One side is currently held, but the other half spills and begins cascading into the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I drink my Potion of Flying that I took from Ripley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you chug a Potion of Flying, and you begin lifting off the ground. The rest of you, you do have these two ramps that push up at least five feet towards where these glass walls are, but the bottom of this entire room is beginning to fill with this liquid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go ahead and on my-- I'm assuming I have spigots in my room? We're each in individual rooms with our own spigots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're all in the same room, sealed by two walls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why the Thunderwave hit us all, because we're all in one giant room together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And all the gems are in our room, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes. All the gems except for the one that Cassandra touched.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I hit the fucking jewel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You reach down and strike the gem. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No fire damage, so 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, okay. You strike the gem as hard as you can, you can see it crack a little bit from the impact. The actual gem itself has a small crack run through its center. Are you guys all currently at the top of the ramps?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're backing up to where we're not in the middle of the acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is what I'm asking, yeah. Trinket's backed up awkwardly against the back, looking really uncomfortable. Cassandra puts her hand up to the wall, and looks at the group of you and says, "Which one is my Percy?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right. See you soon. And going to go right into pulling out the gun and preparing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Preparing what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to take out these gems.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be fine, but we have to do it now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they take out the gems, these earrings work telepathically, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you actually talk into them and it happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to back into the corridor while you guys handle the gems and start talking to Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no corridor. You're inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or the ramp, whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're backing up on the ramp. As you're doing that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be fine. Go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point Delilah kisses her on the head and says, "Don't worry, my dear. It'll be over soon." And they turn around and step into the hallway they entered from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One question, and I'm assuming I'm gone, but in combat, I would be able to roll a wisdom save every six seconds, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. For this, you are technically charmed for 24 hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 24 hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I start talking to Vax over the comms?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I hit the gem, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I Hunter's Mark them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could attempt to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to attempt to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go to attempt Hunter's Mark and as the energy springs forth from your hand, it hits the green wall and scatters across, the arcane nature of the spell halted immediately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, figured as much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, at this point, as you're going for the nearest gem on the wall?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the same one I had before that cracked a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So go ahead and take another shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You strike down and slam it. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's one on the wall, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, same one I hit before. 15 again, no fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You strike the gem. This time the gem shatters. Pieces of it go flying out of the area and parts of it turn to dust and chunks hit and roll down into the acid. The acid, which now is about a foot and half, two feet high, and is slowly rising in the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I step into the acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I start hitting the one in the center with my fucking stupid sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shoot my exploding arrow at the glass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the glass? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Big arrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an exploding arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch Vax turn around and begin to follow the Briarwoods.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't forget who you are. You are stronger than this, you are stronger than them. You are not a Briarwood, you are Vox Machina, and we can't lose you. I can't lose you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're our only hope. Please. You can overcome this. Please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, make an attack roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 plus something, I don't know how to hit things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll your damage with the sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's not much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's something, it's something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can Pike do something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If Pike wants to. Yeah, you guys are all together still.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike, do some cool shit!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm halfway here. This stupid astral projection is driving me nuts!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you wade into the acid you feel the sting as it hits your body. You immediately take five points of acid damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a potion of acid resistance that I drank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, so you take three. Three points of acid damage. And you strike down, arcing down as it splashes, parts of it go across your face. You can feel the tingle of it burn the outside of your skin, but not enough to really cause any serious damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not the face!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you strike down and you find it hit the gem and then slide off as it hits, but you feel it give a bit on the impact. Anyone else want to do anything right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was going to shoot the exploding arrow at the glass door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll the attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, and it was 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, all right. You release the arrow. It streaks across the room, hits the glass, and it explodes with a reverberating crack. You guys all, in the middle of trying to figure out this scenario, didn't cover your ears in time, and it nearly deafens you from the blast of the impact from the reverberation of the room. However, go ahead and roll damage on that. Roll arrow damage and then an additional 4d6 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, that would've been so good to have on them. I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As my bonus action, I turn to Percy and I say, Percy, we're surrounded by metal and glass and stone above us. Is there anything we can do to that stone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitestone's pretty strong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't it burn? Can't you do things with stone, Keyleth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have lightning. Are we going to kill ourselves if we do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could stone, you could get out of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the damage on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I couldn't take Move Earth because we needed Sunbeam. I have Wall of Stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It could buy us more time if we get on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's taken some damage. Not a heavy amount, but you can see there has been a portion of the wall that has been scraped away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About ten feet up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About ten feet up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run over there? I'd have to run through the acid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have to, yeah, unless you want to try and jump across. You could try and jump across if you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I would like to jump across, run over, and start swinging on that section.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What side is this? On the ceiling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is on the side that they left through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, the door is now closed, by the way, and Vax is nowhere in sight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The door closed again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I do great weapon master and hit it three times?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan? Are you making another strike at the gem?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely, is it my turn again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is all fluid. We'll pull it up as you go, and you're taking your shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking three shots at one of the gems on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. You strike down a second time, the acid now beginning to rise; the level's almost up to your chest, and it's a little harder for you to swing, but you still manage to strike true. You take four points of acid damage, but you can feel the damage itself is mounting. It's growing with each progressive amount of you that is currently submerged. You strike down, thankfully the liquid isn't too thick and you still manage to push through most of your force, your magical blade guiding it down to the gem, and you feel it (crack) beneath you. Crack and shatter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have two down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Two down, between the two of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do there appear to be any weak points in the metal anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything's pretty solid, and it's been used multiple times, and you see now that this room is used, and what they used to melt down all the whitestone into the residuum component during the construction of the ziggurat. Some of the notes mentioned it, Ripley mentioned a little bit, but this-- this is bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Acid melts whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The whitestone on the ceiling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The acid that's filling in melts that? Okay, well, that changes things. Does my Control Water spell, would that work with the acid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's such a little water component that that spell is used to focusing on, it would be a little hard for you to do that in enough of amount to actually do any serious effect, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the acid go through glass?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. Glass is specifically how you contain acid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take one of my glass vials that I have and try to get some acid and put it up on the ceiling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can definitely fill it up, but it's a ways up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm flying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're flying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I took a flying potion to get out of the acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ice on the other side, by the way, shatters as it now continues to pour in from both sides, doubling the speed at which it's filling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking my three shots at the next gem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I high enough that I can see where the pipes are coming in at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I could potentially grab hold of one of the pipes on the ceiling and try to move it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to try to grab hold of one of those pipes and aim it toward the ceiling, if I can move it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll get to that in just a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The first one was 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then the second shot-- dear god, it hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He rolled an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Third shot is 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. All three hit. Roll damage for all of those.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 11 for the second shot, and 14 for the third shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (three gun blasts) You unload three bullets in a row. You see, before even the last one hits, the opal itself (crash) shatters off from the final blast, leaving the vacuous hole where it once was embedded in the wall. Vex, you move up and you grab onto it. You begin to try and shove it, and even with your Fly spell, you don't have a lot of weight behind it, so you put yourself up against the wall, find some leverage against one of the metal bars that holds the metal plates in place, and you lift. I need you to make a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm the weakest!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not this time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for this, you don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I help her out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Literally a zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab it, and as you're holding onto it, it's pliable. It's not a very hard metal, but you just don't have the strength, physically, in this one attempt to bend it in any way, shape, or form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my dagger that I have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold on. Use your dagger, and seeing what she's doing, I'm going to cast my Heat Metal spell on it, and start heating and melting it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The pipe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you reach over and cast Heat Metal. The pipe section sticks out about two and a half feet from this point, so you can grasp it there. You look over and see the metal itself beginning to heat up, beginning to glow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to lift it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wrap my hands in cloth, and then I do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good call. What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say to everybody, when Cassandra put her hand on the hidden gem outside the glass, it closed the doors, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I put my hands on that while you're putting your hands on the inside gems, it might open the doors, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially, but we destroyed them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We destroyed two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but maybe if we do the other ones, it would still work? Is it worth a shot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Dimension Door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you take some people with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I can take Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take one person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of my height.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of your size. Medium creatures.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, my size, not my height?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you are, as a gnome, a small creature, aren't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's Percy-sized right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's fake, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double-check this real fast. Yeah, a gnome's considered small, so it would have to be a small creature, for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can take Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just try it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's four of us in here, and four gems left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many gems are left inside?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four. But it could be that that's the only gem that's necessary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or I could go outside the stone door and see if there's any more buttons out there to press.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think going outside is a good idea. Go outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, do you want to make your strikes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, shall I take you with me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The best thing I've ever heard. You and me in a room alone together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First two hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was the damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was for the damage? Oh, got you. So as you slam into it and slam into it, with each progressive hit, you can see the glass itself is gliding off the blade. You're doing bits of damage, but it's going to take you a while. You could get through this in about ten minutes, but right now the acid has lifted to the point where the next round, everyone's going to start being submerged.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take Pike by the hands and I will Dimension Door out through the glass to where she put her hand on the hidden gem. Is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You step out of the acid. It's dripping off the lower half of your body. This sizzling smoke is pouring off your body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My leather pants are singed! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't Lenny Kravitz this. You walk up the ramp, you grab Pike, and the two of you appear on the other side of the glass door, up on the platform where Cassandra pressed the final gem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, now's a good time to talk about us, don't you think? No, I'll just put my hand on the gem.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scanlan, not now!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You put your hand on the gem, and put your hand away for a second and see the gem itself is glowing, but does not seem to be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Try to put your hands on the other non-destroyed gems!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another strength check now, with the Heat Metal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm running over to the other gems.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's way better! 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Okay, with the help of the Heat Metal, which managed to make the metal more pliable, you do still take three points of fire damage because the metal itself is burning, and you're putting your weight against it and pushing against the edge of the wall, but you pull it up, and it begins arcing upward, and you push it over in the direction of the wall where he is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, at the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There is force just pushing it outward. As it arcs over, it starts splattering across the whitestone on the ceiling. As it hits, the whitestone dissolves and you can see it's causing these huge pockmarks in the actual stone above the glass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do that more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep doing it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to switch my Heat Metal spell over to the other spigot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I fly over to the other side and do the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could probably take another round to keep directing it, if you want to. It's up to you. You could either keep directing this one, because right now it's just starting to hit the ceiling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll keep directing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Moving it over there. What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm running over to the gem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put your hands on the gems!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running over to a gem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys make your attacks on separate gems.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're going to put our hands on the gem, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're putting hands on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hands-on and see if anything happens, and if nothing does, I'm going to pull out my sword and start whacking it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys run up and put your hands on the gems.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can they get two gems each?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've both gotten two gems each, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And my hand is on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the bottom gem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, work, damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could, yeah. You could probably get one gem. There's only four gems left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could Trinket do the other one? Where's Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is up against the wall on the sides, very scared right now.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: We need a fourth hand!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay! Still keeping my Heat Metal spell up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You place all of your hands on the gems? No apparent effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull out my sword and start whacking it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck you, gem!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shitballs. We're going to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, the Briarwoods' personal quarters are really plush. They're sick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I rolled a zero!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I forgot, you're outside. You're fine. Pike, you don't, because you and Scanlan are outside of the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'm resistant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you take two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, my love. Is there any way you can get to the other side of this stone wall to see what's over there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Break your gem!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Break my gem?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The outside gem. Break the outside gem!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear Percy yelling from the other side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouting) Break the outside gem!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All I hear is, (muffled noises).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (muffled) Just fucking break the gem!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Break the outside gem!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think Percy wants us to kiss, Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (muffled) Kiss?! No, I just want you to break the goddamn thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said the power of love will inspire him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (muffled) Fuck the power of love! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take my hand and I Guiding Bolt the top of the gem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll a spell attack-- or for Guiding Bolt is it a saving throw?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: One more time? Sorry, I can't hear you very well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't remember if it's a saving throw or not for Guiding Bolt. Let me check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you could hit it with a mace, Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guiding Bolt-- yeah, make a ranged spell attack. With advantage, because it's right in front of your hand.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll two d20s, take the higher of the two, and add your spell attack modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cold as ice, Mercer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're hitting gems, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you say, Ashley?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She said 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. Yeah, that's easy enough. Roll your damage for your Guiding Bolt. It's 4d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm hitting my gem, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying really hard to lift this pipe with my scrawny little arms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (glass breaking noise) Your gem shatters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a 30 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12 for strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 for strength? You manage to move it to the side. You take two points of fire damage as the heat from the actual metal itself is starting to push through the leather, and you can feel it burning the edge of your skin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see, the stonework is melting through and after a few seconds of this, you begin to see the top of where the glass wall ends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get over it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the wall dissipates and the acid begins to push through the rest of the whitestone, you guys look up and you can see the ceiling above you begin to turn dark for a second before part begins to (dripping noises) drip acid into the small chamber that the two of you currently are standing in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Total of 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of 20 damage? Yeah, the gem on the ground before you (glass breaking noise) shatters with a blast of radiant energy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And does the stone door behind us open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have one more gem left. It's the one you were touching.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! We have another gem. Hit it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The one I was touching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to put my hand on it and do--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Squeeze Gem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do another Thunderwave. Bam! See if I can Thunderwave crack it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These things are really easy to kill.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's a lot of energy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage on the Thunderwave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They get killed by not a lot, or a lot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They get killed by hitting them with your fist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or your staff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage? Okay. Thunderwave (explosion noise) resounds off, and you see the gem crack in place, but it's still held in its current position in the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hit it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hit it with your staff!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time, as you guys finish this, the ceiling begins to open into a tunnel above you, and acid begins to fill the room that both of you guys are in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, both of you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did I finish killing my gem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take a shot, if I have anything else to do. Can I take a shot at the gem that she just cracked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like a big enough tunnel now that I can move the pipe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, a person could climb through over top of the green wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A goliath?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a bear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the way you've been leaning over and it is slopping over, you could probably squeeze them through. A bear, you'd have to push Winnie the Pooh-style, but it's doable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 16 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shattering noise) The last gem shatters from the blast of the gun. Pieces of the opal scatter across your face, Keyleth. Not enough to cut you. At which point, the green stone wall behind you, (scraping noise) lifts up, revealing the room behind you. The one in front of you tries to lift up, and is caught because currently, part of the stone that lifts it up has been dissolved.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) We're smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike and Scanlan, you guys currently, in that room, suffer three points of acid damage as your side of the room is now filling up with acid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dimension Door out, again!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three points? Mine's halved, right, so it's two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, out of frustration, I see this, can I do a wall of stone from underneath the glass to try and lift it up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Okay. Go ahead and roll a d20 and add your wisdom check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great. Oh! I get advantage on wisdom, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a wisdom save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking shit. Balls. Wisdom. Just wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just wisdom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? You use your Wall of Stone spell. You feel there is the stone surface beneath the bronze. You can sense, as the stone begins to push up from the whitestone beneath the bronze plates, and it (impact noise) hits, and it's not strong enough to force its way through. Both the bronze plating, and the wall itself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bye, 5th-level spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we lower a rope and get over the glass now that there's a little space?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a strength check to try to bend it away, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've still got that Heat Metal up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the Heat Metal?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's still up. It's a concentration spell, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start moving it away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kick it with my foot to move it out of the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pushing as hard as you can. It's shifting, but it's going to take you another round to move it over. Pike and Scanlan--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm like Chun Lee, my legs are so strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's doing what now? Anything? Anyone else, or are you just waiting on these guys to finish with their actions?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I get out of here and try to start working on the stone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go on the other side so you can open up the door that leads out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, I'm so sorry, how far out is the acid room from where we are right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mean the room they're in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the room that the acid is stored in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know, actually. Oh, you mean the one that was way back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was quite a ways away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, damn it. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably a mile behind you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, is there any way you can get through this stone wall to the other side to see what's there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah! You're made of jelly. Can you do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, we can't hear you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on, we can't hear you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The darkness is consuming her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no, she's muted. Hanging up and calling you back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're feeding it to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can we hear you, Ashley? There we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, roll a perception check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Sorry, guys! I don't know what's going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the evil.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, it's the evil! It's so strong! I rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the acid's pouring and you're looking about, you notice that the acid level raised to a certain point, and doesn't seem to be continuing. Actually, glancing over, you see the door that the Briarwoods left out of, behind you, is made of whitestone, and the acid that has filled this chamber, which is usually sealed off by the glass wall that has now spilled over through the ceiling, has actually dissolved through the bottom of the door. At this time, it's begun to subside, almost like the liquid that's coming through is not keeping up with the amount that is pouring into the hallway behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good news, guys! We're not going to drown.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, make another strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. This is the best. Oh, four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You just can't move it. At this point, the Heat Metal has burned your arms enough to the point where you're finding a hard time managing to keep your muscles together to move it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's made of metal, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doorway that's right there, about waist-high to you, has completely dissolved on the bottom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so we can swim through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to try, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to do that. I'm going to take a snorkel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In doing so, Scanlan, you take eight points of acid damage, reduced to four because of your resistance. You go through and pop out on the other side in the hallway. It's a stone hallway, and the acid is currently dissolving the ground below, and it's sinking into the ground, China Syndrome-style.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any buttons, knobs, levers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking up, you do see immediately to your right in the hallway, there is a stone square with a push plate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Motherfucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what he pushed. Push it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I see Vax push that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw Vax appear behind them and push something in that direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so I will push that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of it begins to glide out, eventually coming to a stop as the acid stops pouring into the room. The door that you swam under lifts up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guess I could have done that before. Sorry. I wanted to wait until they were gone. That's what it was. I was waiting until they were gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time, you see where the opals were on the sides, the portions that keep them housed? Slowly move into the wall, leaving these holes behind them, and the one in the ground depresses and disappears. As it does, the acid that's in the room begins to slowly drain out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, what do you see on the other side of where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I see stone, acid, a very handsome gnome-- oh wait, that's me. And a big button that I just pressed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can see you now, can't we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hi. See you guys, you look green.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless it's still blocking the way because the door won't open, so we have to go up and over the fucking door. So that's what we have to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Up and over the wall?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The glass door that is partially destroyed that won't lower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't open the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: None, no more buttons or levers out there? Nothing else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not currently. You guys smashed everything that was in the vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a tunnel; we can go up and over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a rope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Throw a rope over to get over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it drains over, there is that portion of ceiling now where it's pockmarked and destroyed, close to where the glass wall hits the ceiling--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use the earring and I go, Vax! Vax, please! That acid is filling the room! We're all dying. I don't know what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're walking alongside the Briarwoods into a new chamber, you hear the words hit your ear and you can feel the back of your throat choking up as a part of you is urging you to run back. And as you stop instinctively in your step, the rest of the group walks ahead about ten feet before Sylas looks over his shoulder and says, "Keep up, please. There's work to be done." At which point, you feel yourself just continue stepping forward and catching up to him, because you wouldn't want to make Sylas angry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Purple Man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to get out of this room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Up and over, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. How are you guys getting over, through?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Rope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have the robe of infinite rope-ness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you take a few times. You want to just throw the rope over? You could, however you want to get the rope up and over the area, it takes a few tries but you get it on the other side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm flying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, you're flying, you just drop it over. It's fine. We'll say for the sake of brevity, a few minutes pass. You guys manage to get each one of you over, Trinket being the hardest point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tie him and then Grog lifts him like a pulley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very uncomfortable for everyone involved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, when Trinket reaches the top, it's like trying to fit an oblong object through a hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm flying so I get underneath him and try and wedge him, help him get into the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say it takes an additional ten minutes, but you manage to finally get Trinket through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I have a rumbly in my tumbly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Want to get back into this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be right back, Ashley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back, everyone. So. As you all take a moment to regather yourselves after this circumstance, you climb your way through this acid-scarred portion of the hallway ahead of you, this like small tunnel up to the other side. As you're on your way there, Percy, you notice a flash of purple and black energy course up the front of your Pepperbox. You glance down at the six o'clock, previously empty barrel, and a new name now is emblazoned across it. It says, "Cassandra de Rolo."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. My. God.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, that was on that empty barrel?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. I thought--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He didn't know who it was for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does any of us see this besides him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all come up to the top, you look down and you see Percy still down, looking at his gun in a wide-eyed, spacey expression on his face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. No, I'm not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is your bangy thing okay? Is it your sister?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see what this means.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go take care of this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Let's. But you always have a choice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You climb up and out, you guys make your way down this tunnel, no more than 60 feet from where you are, before the chamber opens up before you into what is a large underground cavern. Mostly cleared out, it looks like portions of it are, you know, both the tunnel and this area--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should, because as far as they know, we're dead now. They don't know we got out of there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So everyone go ahead and roll stealth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still critical failed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, can't you roll again now that I told you we were casting--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Nah. It stays, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't work that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, stealth rolls, plus ten to everyone's stealth. What was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice. 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As a median, the group does really well, so that helps overtake for your misstep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, it's cold in here! Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably what the ramps in the previous rooms were also to collect. You can see there's a residuum dust coating on a lot of these carts, as well as broken pieces of whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The broken pieces of whitestone, are there any that are the size of two hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a few you could probably grab, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I grab a big, two-handed piece and put it in the Bag of Holding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take some of it and rub it on some of my arrows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm scared of all of my dice right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, mine are failing me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex and Percy: as you begin to step out along the wall, and as you guys are moving towards the ziggurat, you can see through the darkness, there is a bit of low light along the edge of the pyramid, and you can see, halfway up the staircase, four individuals stepping up the stairs at a distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this Egyptian pyramid-sized big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more Aztec. It's not quite gargantuan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's 200 stairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Approximately. I'd say the whole structure from bottom to high is maybe 200 feet tall. It's not extremely large.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the roof look like above it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to see at this distance, especially with the very little light here. You can tell just enough, though, that there is some sort of roof, but you can't make any details out from this distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have any geographical idea of where we are in the city? Is this located under the Sun Tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be pretty close to where the Sun Tree is located, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go stomping in there, should we take a short rest and heal up? Is anyone besides me and Pike damaged at all?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm damaged a little.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm damaged, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how long I want to wait when Vax is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't want to start traipsing up. They'll see us coming.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there cover? Can they see us if we can see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you're currently standing, there's very little to no light. If you're careful, you could possibly slip by their detection.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could wait until they get up there and then go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Except what happens when they get up there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quick question: while I'm with my new friends, in any moments that they're not telling me to go somewhere or walk somewhere, can I just look at the symbol on my hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it. Just stare at it whenever I can, when they're not paying attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You glance at it. It doesn't seem to have any particular glow or connection. Especially since Pike made her arrival, it seems to be the energy of connection that was briefly housed in that symbol by her has transitioned to her form here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will anybody gain something back from a short rest that we really need, or do we need to go after them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm afraid they're marching him to his death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To sacrifice him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd gain a few hit points, but it's nothing bad. I can take a potion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll have to heal in battle, if we need to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can do a healing spell, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks, Sarah Palin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's everybody at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That Vasselheim accent is rubbing off on you, Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's looking hurt?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you guys all pretty low?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think save your spells, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the plan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Stealth as much as we can and then take them out? I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're walking up to the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this time, they're close to the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's start making our way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just stairs. Pretty steep stairs, but stairs nonetheless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to Ghostbusters this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How high up can I fly? Is it all dark up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. There's a very little bit of light that's part of the ziggurat itself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep raising up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four sides to the pyramid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four sides. You can only see two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to keep raising up so I can get a better view of what's happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tell Pike real quick, Pike, we are right under the Sun Tree, which was dedicated to the god Pelor. This tree might end up being our best friend in this fight. Keep that in mind going forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are Sarenrae and Pelor good buddies?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, are they on good terms?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would know that Sarenrae and Pelor are adjacent deities in this realm. They have many overlapping interests and both strive to light, to healing-- many spheres of overlap in those regards, so yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Now that I'm thinking about it, I think they are pretty good friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far away are the four figures from us right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, man. They're probably a good 500 to 600 feet from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we flank and go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to just hit them hard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or should we get on each side?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many feet? 50 to 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, at this time, they're just now cresting over and vanishing over the lip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From the base of the pyramid, what would you say the base circumference of this ziggurat is? Is it half a mile around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's smaller than that. I'd say it's about--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 200 feet square? One on each side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, should we come up on different sides?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, what do you think?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Flank them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're going to be inside, though, before we get halfway up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no inside. It's just on top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know what's up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see? I raised up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You raised up and you look--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What little source of light you can see, where the stairs stop, there's a level platform, there's some pillars, and there appears to be a secondary structure, a deep green, almost dark jade-type structure that is built. A square structure right there at the very top.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Probably out of the same glass bullshit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax will hear me if I whisper down to everybody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck. That's right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See if he can stall. Tell him to stall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Vax. Vax!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still respond, if you wish. You still have your mind about you; you just consider the Briarwoods right now your closest allies, and they have to be protected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Stop it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acid everywhere. Vax, please. Isn't there anything you can do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should all be together. You should join me here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I would love to, but I don't know where you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm on the top of a thing. I can see very far. Everybody is very attractive up here. I think something nice is about to happen. I'm afraid to ask questions, though; I don't want to seem--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who are you talking to, lovely boy?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Please, Vax. Please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To Sarenrae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With no advantage? I'm still a half-elf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't he supposed to not be able to get charmed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 13. No, I have advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Feast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This isn't a saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage for half-elf, advantage for feast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Total of 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pushed through enough to guard the answer, as opposed to spilling the truth to your ally. She gives a, "That's not very welcome here. I would "not recommend that. Put it away."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Put it away. That's not welcome here."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. You're still very pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm taken, my darling."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm stalling so that everyone can walk around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm starting to make my way up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're flanking on the far side.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I go up to Vax and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's not here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax isn't with you guys. Vax is with the Briarwoods at the top of the ziggurat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Earring talk.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit. Okay, sorry. That must have been when I got disconnected. I know what's going on now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So while they're having this discussion, you guys begin to ascend the steps as a group?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are four sides. Who wants to come on my side?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go with Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you can join me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm flying up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm just walking up the center.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's going--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinket's with me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, thought for a second: what if Percy goes as a distraction? Percy goes first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all look like Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they might be able to see through that. Use Percy as bait while the rest of us go up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax looks like Percy right now! They know we're up to something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's why I said send in the real Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Send in the real Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, how many groups are you breaking into?

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three groups. Okay. Gnomes in one, Percy and Trinket in one, Grog and who else?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, and you're floating above somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm floating above, keeping an eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) Oh no, this is so stupid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My heart is pounding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all separate, the closest stairway to you, you would probably get there sooner. Who's taking that stairway?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The gnomes. We're slow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm sneaking into the dark as much as I can, but I want to raise up and be where I can be above them and shoot down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and you three are going on this side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, we'll say you're on this side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should split the party further.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could. It's not a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so brilliant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are about to reach the lip. Is there any preparation you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the building seem-- is it completely encased?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The building is entirely encased in this material.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they're already inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't gotten to the very top of the lip yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see? I'm raised above, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, as they're having this conversation, they talk a bit with Vax, speak with Cassandra, then they step forward and begin to open the two doors to the central chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I ask a clarification question? The mojo they have on me: do I think they're my best friends in the world, or is it more Kilgrave; I do whatever they say, but have my own opinion trapped away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your own opinion, you just trust them implicitly. They have to be protected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. It's a little of both, it seems like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like any close friend who would ask something of you and say, "please come with me," there is an essence that you're compelled--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I trust them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You trust them, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I close to Percy at all? Or did we already separate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you guys have already separated.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dang it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to stop them before they close these doors. If they close the doors, it's over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we see them closing the doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've just opened the doors and are beginning to enter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, go. Get their attention. Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm heading up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay hidden as my-- oh, god-- and I'm going to dip the rest of my arrows in holy oil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you're stepping up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I inspire Pike real quick, just before the battle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what do you do to inspire her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When I look up, can I see the ceiling now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking up, you can see the roof is carved earth. There is no loose stone; it looks like this chamber has been carefully hollowed out over time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I see a root system of a really deep-running tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently? No, you cannot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm walking up the steps. I'm putting the mask on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you put the mask on and you begin to ascend, you can feel the nerves tickle your belly and you know what you're about to encounter, and doing so, you feel that heat rise in the back of your neck, and as you do, (whoosh) the smoke begins to billow out from under your collar and out of your sleeves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I make my way to the top of the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket coming slowly behind you. They open the doors and they're beginning to step into the chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sylas!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They stop. Both Lord and Lady Briarwood look over their shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A moment of your time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other, (sighs) close the chamber door. Sylas reaches out and grabs something or pushes something that's out of sight, and then they both turn and begin to step forward a little bit, with Vax and Cassandra flanking them, stopping right outside of the doors.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, as he's distracting them, get in position? Try and stealth behind these buildings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are on technically that side and that side of the pyramid right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It looks like there's pillars and shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the pillars are evenly spread around the entire chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's come in from the back. I don't know what the gnomes are doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys would have to have come around the corner, and this is the walkway here, so you'd be coming in from this side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay out of sight, but get as close as we can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I float closer in the darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up. Up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up, up? My platforms seem to have gone missing for the preparation of this game, but we'll say for the time being, you are up here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My hands are on a device which I have made that's on my hip that I'm ready to begin using at a moment's notice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a French tickler.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the most ticklish French tickler you've ever seen, baby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have something planned. I'm just going to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's this? What's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have debts to settle, Sylas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And apparently, you and your friends are obnoxious enough to not stay dead."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They were kind enough to make sure that I made my way here to face you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah gives him a look, too, and says, "Very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Hex on Lady Briarwood and pull my smoke bomb at the exact same second and throw it at them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, as you release your hand and the smoke builds up at your fingertips and then shoots off and clings itself to her form, she looks down with a bit of a grin, half-laughs to herself as the smoke bomb gets lobbed. She begins moving her hands like that to begin casting a spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I let go of my arrow and cast Conjure Barrage with a holy arrow at them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a holy arrow at them. All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will take you a moment to get over to that point because you guys are just coming around the corner. So, first things first. Percy, you lob the smoke bomb. (thud, hiss) This area here fills with a billowing smoke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was shooting it right in front of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it fills this area here. It's a 20 by 20-foot-- it's essentially a recreation of the Fog spell for a short duration. It fills that vicinity there. As the smoke fills, you want to Conjure Barrage into the smoke?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know they're all there, and it shoots a cone of arrows at them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. All right, roll for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's holy arrows. All of them will be holy arrows, because Conjure Barrage uses whatever kind of ammunition I have shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the saving throw on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a good question. Conjure Barrage is-- dexterity save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to grave. There we go. Proper Briarwood music.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Surprise, motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know why my sister is firing at me, but I would like to use Uncanny Dodge or Evasion, whichever is applicable in this moment, so I don't get hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a whole lot of arrows flying at you, just letting you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe Uncanny Dodge, you just roll a saving throw, and if you make it, you take no damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So dexterity, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe so, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's pretty good. That's a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Damage on that was?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 3d8, plus whatever the holy would be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The holy is an additional 1d4 radiant damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, for each?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For anybody that would be affected by it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, that's it? I just do that? 3d8, that's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. Not including the d4, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not including the d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's four damage to both Sylas and Cassandra. You take no damage from it because of Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I call out and say, Vex'ahlia, what are you doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so roll a d4.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two. Okay. Two additional points of damage to Sylas. All right, and as the smoke begins to dissipate?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start running. I'm booking to the right, and I don't have any more actions, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's going to be your go. Everyone now? Roll initiative for the beginning of the Briarwood battle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ugh, oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have the shittiest fucking initiative rolls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's stupid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so is mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Getting it all out of my system now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Me too. I call it dying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) That's how you get it all out of your system.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 25 to 20?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nobody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nobody. We all ate it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have the highest initiative?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. We don't get the drop on them because we were sneaking around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. 15 to ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Worst initiative I've ever rolled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, and Pike, what did you get? Sorry, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Vex and Taliesin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughing nervously) We're going to be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All my dice. Every dice! I don't have any dice left to roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time, Delilah steps this way, outside of the smoke, (coughs) moving out of the way. You can see, there is a slight shimmer around her form at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A slight shimmer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. She is going to begin by looking over to you, who threw that bomb at her, put out her hand, and say--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can she see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She stepped out of the smoke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, because I moved. Bomb, then ran.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's smoke between them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's smoke between us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In this area? Oh, yeah, so she would look around, get out of the way, look for you, sees nothing but a bear that has climbed to the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I turned into a bear. It's Willow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it a bear, or is it fat Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's fat Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it is. She looks very confused for a second. "Percy?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, question! Am I still Percy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You still look like Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If she's fooled by a fat Percy, she's surely fooled by a svelte Percy. Does she think she has Percy? What's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They can still see the illusion, but you get the sense that she can see through it, meaning it's almost like the two layers are over top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So she can see big Percy, but realizes it's not big Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not big Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just absurd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can see a bear wearing a Percy costume, is how it looks to her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a bear wearing a Percy costume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She actually looks around and sees the weird Percy, sees nobody else in the area-- she can't see you because of your stealth, even though the Conjure Barrage was in the middle of the fog cloud, it prevented her from keeping sight on anybody, and you're out of the way, so the only thing she can see right now is weird Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to use my bonus action to hide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see her confused look, and I call out, we're all Percy! Get it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. She, not really knowing what to do, goes, "Sylas. Take this boon." She puts her hand out, and you can see a bit of dust form in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take this spoon?

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Boon.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: This spoon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She casts a spell on him. That ends her turn. And then she steps back into the side of the fog there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She inspired him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She helped him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I hear talking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear talking. You come around the corner?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I come around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're about here, so you can move forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The second I see her, Delilah, I will cast Lightning Bolt on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lightning Bolt? She's immune.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you see her jump back into the cloud, and you unleash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actually, are they in a line? Is there a way I could get in a line?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not with this pillar there, no. This pillar's blocking the way. Right now, you're only seeing her, at this point, since she goes into this fog cloud, so you can throw it in the direction she is, if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You release the bolt of lightning. Roll 8d6 damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were you there for that fight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Was I?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you were there for that fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would I know anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was ages ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a long time ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recall that lightning seemed to not have the impact it usually does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would I know that enough not to cast it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, through all the thoughts and preparation for this fight, if you would like to rescind that, you would be ready to Lightning Bolt and be like, "Wait, no. That didn't work."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, then undo. I will undo, and I will instead-- I will try to blind her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a great idea. Spectacularly great idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Silence her would be good, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Through my Hand Cone of Clarity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the saving throw on that one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would be 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what is the saving throw? Is it wisdom?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. Blindness. Oh, Jesus. I never use it, so I don't know. Blindness is a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution for Delilah. Yeah, she makes it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She makes it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled 18 plus three. 21.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She vanishes into the smoke cloud that Percy had left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that my movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move a little closer if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I get the pillar between us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And can I see anyone else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn, Scanlan. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do I do in this situation? I trust them, but I also trust them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next one you see, you're probably going to go ahead and try to make an aggressive action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do whatever you tell me. Were I to see her, the most important person to me in the world, act on Lady Briarwood, I'd be like, "What's up, that's Lady Briarwood, kill her?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would try and attack her to try to convince her to stop the assault, probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and I've seen Trinket and I've seen Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've seen Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan you haven't seen yet. You're still inside this cloud. All you've seen is Percy. You didn't even see her strike at you, other than seeing the arrows flying in so you know it's her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm going to step right in front of Lady Briarwood and shield her with my body from Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, you've got to stop. This is madness! This is that spirit of yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can they see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a big cloud of smoke.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to hold my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not going to get any closer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to put my back against the column.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You use double movement to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fall over. And then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To move right there behind the pillar with your back to it. Okay. That gets us to Sylas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaping out of the smoke, (whoosh) with an unnatural speed, Sylas, jumping in the air, pulling from the scabbard on his back a long, onyx two-handed sword you've seen once before. Leaps and lands right before you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can see me? He can find me in the smoke?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leapt out of the smoke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And has a really high passive perception. He leaps and lands right before you with this grin on his face, the blade out in front of him, and says, "Boy, you poke where you shouldn't." And goes in for three attacks on you with his blade. That's a natural two, so 12? Oh, no that would be 14? That is a 34?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 34 hits. The other two do not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 24 still hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then that would be his turn, so two hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Slow him down.

lines.name: MATT
