lines.text: You take 13 points of slashing damage from the first strike, and then you take ten points of slashing damage from the second strike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 26 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make two constitution saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 23 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And make two constitution saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry, just updating my sad little hit points. Two constitution saving throws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and the second one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A critical fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You feel as each strike of the blade cuts into your flesh, a portion of your body's strength is sapped from it. Your strength goes down by two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My strength is a negative one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I mean your score. Not the modifier, your score.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, so my strength is at zero, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is your strength normally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, so it's now ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's now ten, which means my modifier is zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the energy fill him now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd take that turn now, if I could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used your movement and you held your action. You can now take your action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Break his head like a melon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't get to him now. I used my movement.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Chain!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use the Chain of Returning, with the holy oil on the war hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you're behind the pillar, you see him rush up and slash into Percy. You reach around and (throwing noise) release the axe, spinning towards him with the chain behind it. Not the axe, the hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the first Briarwood damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15 damage with the fire and the holy oil does an extra--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over and you can see where it hit; there's a burst of radiant energy that's burning into his side. He glances down at you with a frustrated look. Go ahead and make your save to try and pull your hammer back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So that finishes that turn. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to use Healing Word for Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on the opposite side of the battlefield, so, at full movement you'd be there; with the range on Healing Word, you wouldn't be able to get to him right now in time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Even with a 60-foot range? Am I close?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 foot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can't see anything, so she's 80 feet away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you use your Sprinter's Boots.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll use my Sprinter's Boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. Just know Ashley, that sprinting in like this will take you right in front of the Briarwoods.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, because I can't see the board.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's not a good thing. Maybe it's better to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you help Vax? You're really close to Vax.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, am I close to Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are near Vax, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I get right behind him and cast Greater Restoration on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. The fog obscures them; they have three quarters cover. You can still see their shapes in the cloud, it's not completely obscured.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And there's a pillar between you and me in the middle of a 30-foot stretch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you can hide behind it after you cast it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. So you rush up, around the pillar, clicking your Sprinter's Boots to give the distance, you rush up into the cloud, right into the face of Vax. And Vax, you look down at Pike, now aggressively coming towards you. Protecting Lady Briarwood, you pull your daggers out instinctively and look down at her with a look of "What are you doing?" You reach forward and reach out your hands against him. Let me check Restoration real fast. Let me see here, Greater Restoration. 5th level. Ends effects like charmed or petrified. As you reach out and touch him you feel the impact of the Briarwoods' influence fade from your mind. As she touches you, the charm is dispelled and you look at your daggers and look where you are and look at the moments and the last few minutes and you're like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then can I look up and stay in a defensive stance and back towards Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, feigning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Slick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You back up into a defensive position towards Lady Briarwood. Okay, that's just from immediate reaction to that. Pike, do you want to stay where you are, do you want to use the rest of your movement to move back behind the pillar?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cover.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll move back behind the pillar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any bonus moves there, Pikey?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. I'm going to wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me? I'm going to shoot my storm arrow. I'm going to shoot from my Longbow of the Sky Sentinel. At Lord Briarwood. At Sylas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a natural one for the first. That's three arrows, though. The second one's good, that's a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the last one is a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, those two hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so that is an extra 1d6 lightning damage for every attack. 15 for the first one, and then... 15 for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that was -- Oh no. Yeah, that's it. And that's the first attack. The second attack is another shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With a holy arrow. At him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, what was your initiative again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bringing up the rears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15, for the last hit, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. All right, so as you're floating up above you pull back your arrow and inciting the magical enchantment of the bow, you release and as it does it (crack crack) crackles with energy and splits into three separate arrows that arc around each other almost like a helix of DNA. As they all streak downward they (impact noises) slam into Sylas from the other side him now being assaulted on all fronts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use my bonus action to hide again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you're pulling way, way back. If you want to pull back towards the shadow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you pull further and further away from it. Go ahead and make a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Flying Vex is pretty dope. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vanish into the shadow of the sky. You dart out of the darkness and then disappear back into it. All right. That ends your turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just got blasted. What's that thing I can do? I'm going to use a bonus action to do my little healing surge that I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My fighter ability thing, which is 1d10 plus 12, so that's 18 points of damage back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Catch that, Pike? He healed himself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I brought myself up a little bit. Just a little bit. And I'm going to shove the Diplomacy glove right into Sylas's face and try and do a straight shove to get him off of me. I have never used this before. I don't actually know how it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, and you previously charged this--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I charged this when I got hit by the lightning attack in the crypt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a melee attack. So this would be, I'd say--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say make it dex-based because it's more of a quick grab on your end. Make a d12 plus your proficiency, plus your dex. So plus ten. It's plus ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus ten to a d20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you! That's much better. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did not make his saving throw on that with a four.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! He rolled three sixes and a five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 23 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. The shock charges through his dark armor he (groans). You can see that the dark veins pulse through his neck as the energy surges through his body. He slaps the hand away at this point and you can see the smoke and it's (hissing) off the armor. (growls)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What you going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to, Jesus Christ, okay! I can't really use my gun because I'm too close. I'm going to pull out my sword and take two more slashes and I'm going to run like a mother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First slash is a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's lame. That's 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Second slash is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? Okay, it hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's 11 points of damage. Now I'm going to book it towards Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're bolting towards Grog. He's going to swing at you with the sword as an attack of opportunity as he does so. That is 21 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take 17 points of slashing damage as the sword arcs across your back. You rush towards Grog on that side. Roll another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. The strength thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good thing you don't use strength.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it can still kill you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now Cassandra's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, god damn it, what are you going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make the right decision, girl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (blows raspberry) Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine? Roll a perception check, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Seemingly out of nowhere, Cassandra appears from behind the pillar, blade out, shortsword at the ready, and attempts to jam it into the back of Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sneak Attack damage. She's a rogue!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 21 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That actually hits me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can hear all the dice he's picking up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Halved, because I'm raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slashing damage because it's a sword, but yeah, halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of slashing damage from the sneak attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That could have been worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will end Cassandra's turn. Next up is Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Finally. Okay, running up the stairs, running up the stairs--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you've been waiting around the side here for everyone, so you're just now cresting around that corner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beautiful. Can I move to where I'm in a nice pretty line with a Briarwood and Cassandra? Over here? And Sunbeam!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sings) Deo gratias!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right in a line.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do it. This is it. This is everything, right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Kiki.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're our cannon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've been waiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sunbeam. Yeah, it will hit both him and Cassandra and Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who cares?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so a constitution saving throw, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Constitution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra makes it with a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So full damage on Grog, half damage on Cassandra. I mean no damage. She's going to use her reaction to use Uncanny Dodge, so Cassandra takes no damage from it. Sylas is going to use one of his legendary resistances to automatically succeed on his saving throw, so he takes half damage. Oh, they had disadvantage on the saving throw, but he can automatically make it, so never mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15 plus eight, so that's 23. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 damage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, halved. He takes 12 points of radiant damage. So as you rush around the corner, he sees you appear again and gives you a look. As the beam of light appears, his eyes roll back in fear, and the blast (fire noise) streaks out, blasting into Grog, blasting into him--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Undead and oozes have disadvantage on saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but he has the ability to automatically make the saving throw, as a legendary creature. However, as the beam fades, you can see part of his face is burned to ash, and you can see where the lip is gone, the teeth are exposed, and the sharp fangs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I don't know if this makes any amount of difference, but for the duration of the spell, I have a 30-foot radius sunlight glowing in my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it's bright in here now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it. Now I can see. Oh, shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As long as he's in that circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Just keep on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a 30-foot radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that ends Keyleth's turn. Back to the top, Delilah. Delilah is now going to step out of the cloud, which is now dissipating at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is she taking a step away from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm taking my blade with the poison on it, and I'm going to slash at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as your reaction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 would hit her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that had whatever that poison is that I sold my soul to a hag for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it did. So roll damage on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so the regular damage is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say you sold your soul to a hag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's deal with one problem at a time! That's a ten for just the damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll an additional 6d6 poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a Sneak Attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, this is poison. I'm not in a position to sneak attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But this is the same as a sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12, 13, 19, 24 points of poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you strike out, the blade scrapes across the front of her... shit, I forgot that. I'll keep that in mind for next time. The blade streaks across the front of her body as she runs past, (pained gasp) then you feel, as she takes a few steps away, (groans) and she coughs and blood spatters across the ground. She looks over her shoulder at you. (heavy breathing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just stare with a half-cocked smile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She immediately looks back at you and says, "You boy, stay still!" And puts her hand out towards you. I need you to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage, because I'm a half elf. I don't need anything because I'm a half-elf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she blinded?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It didn't work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is she trying to charm me or hold me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trying to disintegrate me to death?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks over to you and mutters under her breath (foreign word). It's a phrase you've never heard before, but as soon as it happens--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As soon as she does that-- do I see this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just around the side of this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do not see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance around the side for three-quarters cover. Roll a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a dead roll, a dead roll, it's between two. That's terrible. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do not see this happening, unfortunately. Your mind suddenly goes blank as the Power Word that's spoken suddenly stuns you in place, unable to react.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it a wisdom thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no saving throw. If you have less than 150 hit points, you are stunned for the next minute. You have to make a saving throw every turn to resist it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! She's strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you stop there. Your daggers (clanking noise) drop to the ground as the smoke begins to dissipate around you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do the daggers then shunt back up to my belt, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's more of a willful return. Once you regain your composure, you can will them back to you. But currently you're drooling out of your mouth, staring into space right there. She moves off to this side and gets behind Cassandra for protection. She's going to end her turn. She did waste her action that turn to do that. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah man, she's powerful. I will step out again, from behind. And I will try again. But this time I will say, hey, you paralyzed my friend, let's see if you like it! And I'll try to hold her. Hold Person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Hold Person, okay. A DC of 19, you said for that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. She's going to make a wisdom saving throw. She rolls a 21. A natural 19 with a plus two. I know. But as the spell shoots out from your hands, it bounces off of her, seemingly to no effect. She is inherently a very powerful caster, and her defenses show that. Do you want to use your movement to move closer, or do you want to stay where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's Vax near me, right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax is right there, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to-- shit. Hide behind you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, I'm bigger than you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy's got a gun. And then, yeah. Sure! I'll try to duck behind Vax for cover.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The whole world's come undone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that'll get you to about there. Okay! That'll end your turn. Vax, you're up. You spend your turn staring off into space. At the end of your turn, make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Right now? 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Yeah, unfortunately you're still caught there, staring off into the darkness. Looking out over the rest of this cavern before you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a constitution?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a constitution, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to go into a frenzied rage, and I would like to see and swing away at Lord Briarwood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Actually, real fast, before that happens, at the end of Vax's turn, Sylas is going to use one of his secondary legendary actions to move without his movement, again back over to this side of the pillar. He darts around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, he left. Cassandra's there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still move during your turn if you want to. But if you want to go after Cassandra you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She would get an attack of opportunity, wouldn't she? I'm going to turn her into applesauce.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry. Not really sorry. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same thing, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 damage, on the first one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 for the first one. And 22 for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But she doesn't take any holy damage off of the oil on the thing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she looks at you with this look of "That really hurt!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I've been known to take a lady's breath away! (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to move, or will you stay where you are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has to keep away from Keyleth. He is going to, instead... he's in a rough place. Then he's going to move one, two, three, four, five, six... Nope! Actually, he's going to-- you know what? He's going to take it. He's going to go ahead and boldly step into the sunlight, which puts him at disadvantage with his attacks. But he is going to unload on you, Percy, who he marked previously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He marked you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You marked his wife. So that is a 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, he still crits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two natural 20s in a row!?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so with disadvantage he still crit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last one is a 23.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With disadvantage he still crit, how?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled two natural 20s in a row.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you-- yeah, right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited about this new character I'm working on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of slashing damage from the first strike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jesus. Okay, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crit is 27 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the last one is 13 points of slashing damage. Roll three constitution saves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll tally up the damage in a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, ignore the last attack. Because technically, Lady Briarwood would have lost her concentration on the Haste spell she had on him from the damage she took earlier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ignore the last attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ignore the last attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that would have been-- my first save is 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? All right, that does succeed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's 22, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you resist the effect of the two strikes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to figure out how much damage I just took.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So that ends Taliesin's turn. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you at, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at the other side of the world, but you could probably get close enough to do something if you ran and not get in anybody's way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's hurting, but he's not dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's pretty close to dying.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to Sprinter's Boot over to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many times can you use Sprinter's Boots?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sprinter's Boots. How many times can you use it? Does it say on the item? How long does it last?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can use it twice. I haven't used it yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're now within 35 feet of him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Is that within range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Healing Word it is, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, so I'll Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about-- oh, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can inform her of the map though, since she doesn't have a very--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So I can't Cure Wounds because I'm not close to him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. You have to be right next to them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So let's do that. Oh my word, I'm shaking so bad. Okay, here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll for the heal on that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just rolling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're all the way in Vasselheim!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're so far away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, all right. What level was that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Five. Sorry, I did five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 5th-level Healing Word. All righty. That's a bonus action. You can still do up to a 2nd-level spell as your action if you'd like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shoot. Okay, I'm not close to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you unleash some holy fire on any fucks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Like a radiant blast or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I take my Mace of Disruption and slam it on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh god. Wait, how close am I to Sylas?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're 15 feet from Sylas and 15 feet from Lady Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, 30 feet from Sylas and 15 feet from Lady Briarwood.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. You know what? Let's just do a Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sacred Flame? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's 20 feet from Sylas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, guys. This totally sucks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right, it's all right. You know, the astral plane is tricky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So dexterity saving throw. He does not make his dexterity saving throw. 1d8 radiant damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. And then can I use Scanlan's extra?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: That's only on the attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for damage. So just roll 1d8.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Vex, you're up. You've got Trinket right here on the steps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I am going to cast-- nobody's in a clump anymore! They keep moving around!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That freaking wizard woman, man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to attack Lady Briarwood with just two attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good! Chip her down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you keep Trinket here by the steps?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's going to run next to Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And then I'm going to shoot her a couple times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, because I forgot to do this on the last attack, we're initiating now. Her image is shifting based on her location, so you have a disadvantage on the attack roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But the last one was good, so 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the first one was a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20 again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do not have disadvantage. After you hit her, the effect vanishes. That is a natural 20 against her. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 for the first one. And then what do I do, just double the second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage, then double the dice roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. So (arrow whizzing) the arrows both strike into her chest (pained grunt). The shimmering to her form vanishes for a second. You can see her cloak falls limp momentarily. She looks off into the shadow and sees you floating above.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hide!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You attempt to hide? Right now you're just pulling in and out of the shadow? You shoot and you're going to have to try and back up even further. Probably out of your attack range to disappear again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Instead of backing up, can I go sideways?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try to get over this way, but you don't have enough movement to get there. You'd get about there and still be out in the open this turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's one of those things where you're just out in the sky right now. Initially, when there was the overhang and they were covered in the smoke, it was easier for you to hide in the shadow. But now you've made yourself known, you have nothing hiding behind you and her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go below where the steps are to hide? Behind the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would be able to get right about level this turn, and next turn you could go beneath. So you would not be able to hide as an additional this turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I want to stay high. And I'm going to use my bonus action to cast Hunter's Mark on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man! I should have done that at the beginning, but I thought I was going to hide again. What a waste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So that ends your turn. Percy, you're up. Actually, at the end of your turn, Sylas is going to use another one of his legendary actions to make another attack on Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God-fucking-damn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many of those fuckers does he have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, he gets three every turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He gets three every turn?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Every round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After every round, I mean. That will be-- he has disadvantage, so he doesn't crit. (laughs) But that is still a 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 19 and a 20. My rolls for him have been pretty good these past few rounds. So that's another 13 points of slashing damage against you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike helped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 13 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep! And then roll another constitution--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Saving throw. That's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? You're fine. Okay. Continue with your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's just no getting the fuck away from him, is there? That's fine. Well he's in the 30-foot radius of light right now, so do my attacks have an advantage against him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he just has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. There's just no backing away from him right now. I'm going to have to wait for him to try and break off from me through Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He wants you. He wants your bod.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I get it. So, everyone wants my bod. I'm going to take three slashes with the sword again since I'm too close to use the guns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25? Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got inspiration!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, but I don't want to waste it on this. And 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes (groan) from the pain. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's got more where that came from though. He's a very inspiring person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want you to inspire other people. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 damage, all right. That ends your go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Save it for a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra is going to-- actually, she's going to move alongside, still staying next to Grog. And moves up with her blade out towards you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks over at Sylas, and Sylas is nudging with his eyes. And she looks at you. And she drops her blade for a second. And just stands there for a second, looking at the scenario. And her turn is spent there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's trying! She's trying to fight it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Knock her out. Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. How close am I to Sylas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently 25 feet from him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Here's what I'm going to do. Seeing that Sylas is distracted, I'm going to run up, and I'm going to put my hands on his back, and I'm going to cast Sunbeam through him and try and hit Lady Briarwood as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a pillar between the two of them, so it won't go through the pillar, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I just hug him, and I'm like, (sings) Let the sunshine in!

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA, TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: (sing) Let the sunshine in. The sun shine in!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really? You're going to kill him with hugs. This is the most Keyleth thing I've ever heard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if it's going to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Balls, fuck, shit. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to use his second legendary action to automatically succeed the saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 25, total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, okay. So that's 13. This time, as you blast into his back you see the light burns through parts of his shoulder and chunks of his flesh are actually blown through his armor. His armor streaks open for a second. He's like, (pained grunt). Smoke is now sizzling up around him and he looks over his shoulder with this angry red gaze--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I take my nails and dig them in a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, he uses another legendary action to then try and shove you off and arc upwards with his sword across the front of your chest. Even with disadvantage, that's still 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take 16 points of slashing damage, then make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait. Hang on. Okay, has to be over 12, right? A saving throw? 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Okay, you resist the effect of the sword. That ends your turn. Back at the top. Sylas right now is like (panting). He's looking pretty rough. Lady Delilah runs up around the side and goes, "My love, we're not ready, but the timetable's been pushed. We have no choice." And she wraps her arms around them and they both--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cast Counterspell as a reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Counterspell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not again!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 60 feet. Am I close enough?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say-- shit. Do I know what she's casting? Am I familiar with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're familiar with the actions about it, so you'd have an idea, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know what level it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know what level, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'll say, (sings) Huh! That's the sound of the gnome, fucking with your spell! Yeah. And I'll cast it at level four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At level four? All right. So I need you to roll--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck, so it's higher than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's casting it at 5th-level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this, roll a d20 and add your charisma bonus to it. So plus five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a charismatic guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She whips around, (growls). Okay. Yeah, that's going to end her turn. All right. With this, that ends her turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog? I hold my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And instead I will inspire Grog with a little harmonica ditty. (harmonica)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jaunty!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, is it his turn now, next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is not. You hold the rest of your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vax. Still left there, staring into space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Constitution save at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be a constitution saving throw again, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If only Scanlan had inspired you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If only. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still left there. Useless. Staring in the distance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thinking of IKEA instructions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I thought Trinket would be able to help you, but you're not doing anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, now you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So for the Boots of Levitation--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, before that happens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, he's going to use his third legendary action in this round to, without any attacks of opportunity, move.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that Lord Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. He pulls away, still trying to get out of the range of the sunlight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. The Boots of Levitation. It says it requires an action to levitate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I do three attacks? Or just two, and then have the action left over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could action and then you'd have your one bonus strike as a frenzied rage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you put on the boots as a bonus action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm already wearing them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just set it up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Set it up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could do it on this move. Then on the next move--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's too long.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fuck it. I'll take all three strikes at Lady Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So you move in, to there. Go ahead and make your attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good. 25?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage on these strikes, as her cloak has now kicked back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 misses. First blow passes through her form harmlessly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're inspired!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use that inspiration on that one. No, not on that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first one missed, the second one missed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first and the second one missed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first strike, with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus Christ. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits. As this one actually finds purchase on her torso, the shimmering effect vanishes once again, the cloak falling limp to her side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's starting to get almost feral in her frustration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feral?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growls) She's angry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look at that sexy hand!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mister is injured, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's looking rough!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And she is not flickering anymore, so I can get a good hit on her, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Yeah, the disadvantage on attacks against her has faded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will go on her. I don't like her, so I'll punch her in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Goes forward. Go ahead and roll for your spell attack against her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Is this through the cone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't a cone aspect to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so do I just roll to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here you go, I'll pull it up right here. All right, this is the clenched fist? You make a melee spell attack. Roll a d20 and add your spell attack bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. (giggles) Spell attack. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. As the fist (whoosh) towards her, she ducks and it slams into the pillar, cracking the stone slightly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. How far away am I from both of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From both of them? You are about 45 feet from Sylas and about 65 feet from her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get ten feet closer to her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) Can you inspire Vax?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the rest of my turn. I already used it to inspire Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just outside of the radius of it. And, glancing over at you, after you just unleashed that swing of attacks towards his wife, he goes, "You. Help us." Make a wisdom saving throw with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll. High.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll like you're Percy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow. With that, Grog, now you realize you've been on the wrong side of this battlefield the whole time. And your allies are being assaulted by individuals that claim to be your friends but might be completely against this whole circumstance. Your allegiance switches for now to defend them at all costs. That's going to end his turn. Pike!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait. I'm raging. Can I be charmed? (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good notification to make. The charm effect hits your mind. This is why you read your abilities, guys. I don't remember all the details.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Best question of the night!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Intelligence of six. It takes a second!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you see this look, you feel the influence begin to pry. But it isn't enough to push through the red and blazing anger--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was the thin red line, Travis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My turn? Okay, so I would like to Channel Divinity and Destroy Undead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is what we hired you for!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just as a heads up, Destroy Undead, for the most part, is only effective against lower-level undead. Knowing that Sylas is a vampire, it might not have the desired effect that you're thinking it might.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that is--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's give it a try!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. We're bringing this up here real fast.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How close am I to him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty close.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pretty close. 20 feet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what, I feel like I want to hit him with my Mace of Disruption.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's rough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So instead you run up, charging towards him, shield up in front of you. Pike, her blazing radiant form, the energy rippling off from behind her. You pull back your mace, and as it swings through the air, a quick flicker of angelic wings appear at your back as your mace swings down towards him. Go ahead and roll your attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on. Okay, 16. But I'm going to use War God's Blessing and add ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: War God's Blessing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. War God's Blessing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She has inspiration from you too, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But has she rolled yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, when any creature within 30 feet makes an attack roll you can use your reaction to grant that creature-- usually it's against other creatures. Okay. War God's Blessing you can only use on other creatures, but you do have Channel Divinity: Guided Strike, which you can use on yourself. It's essentially the same thing. You give yourself plus ten bonus to the roll.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you use your Channel Divinity: Guided Strike instead?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So that would bring you to 26? That would hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so you slam down onto Sylas with your Mace of Disruption. Go ahead and roll damage on that. He is considered an undead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A thousand pieces.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many times do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well you roll your damage, and it does an additional 2d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The mace damage--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, got it. Sorry guys, sorry. I'm back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Break into a million pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you, too. Your headset looks really pretty!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like looking at the Technicolor logo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody get their heads down, like Ashley.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as per the effect of the spell, he now has to make a wisdom saving throw, which he does succeed. If he failed, he would have been destroyed. However, on a success, he is still afraid of you. So he is now considered afraid of Pike. Disadvantage on all attack rolls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck yeah, he is! Let them know, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until the end of your next turn. Awesome, Pike! Anything else you want to do on your turn, or is that it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would love to go up to Vax, but I don't think I can, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Then I'll stay, I'll stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn Pike. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome, I'm going to shoot him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to shoot Sylas?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, with holy arrows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That does not hit him. Come on. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits. Just barely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17, plus two holy damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first attack missed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the second one hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That finishes Vex's turn. Unless you want to move? Stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm afraid my flying potion's going to start to wear off soon, so I'm going to move. Is there a roof? On that middle compound building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see, no. It is open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I land on top of the pillar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pillar holds a slight overhang, so you can land on top of the overhang if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you land on top of the overhang, stopping there. Which blocks all view from beneath this line, there, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I can still see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could peek around if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. First thing I'm going to do is I'm going to pull out the Pepperbox. And I'm going to take a shot at Sylas, and I'm going to get him to drop his sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, let's see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not going to kill him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope! Not yet. Just in case things go bad-- and I also just want to make sure-- that's a 26?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. No damage, but he drops his weapon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But he drops his weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So with that, (bullet impact) the blade he was holding clatters to the ground before him, the onyx blade shining in what low light there is around this temple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does... ten points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then turns into a mist form in the space where he is. He is currently now a form of mist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he can go heal himself unless we can get him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's going to take care of this. How close am I to Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're ten feet from her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a couple of steps back, and I'm going to do a fire shot and an ice shot with my last two shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you've already done two shots.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah. I'll fire shot with my next shot. Does she currently have advantage or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because it has not come back to her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to also put sharpshooter on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay. (counting) 26 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's-- plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that her right there? No that's Cassandra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Cassandra. That's Briarwood, right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and plus the Hex! So that's (counting) 24 points of damage plus two points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whew, nice. The shot (bang) blasts into the side of her face. You can see part of her jawbone is cracked as part of this, and her ear is blown off to one side of her face, (choked groan) and she cradles it to her side as (grunts).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a ketchup packet!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's spend an action surge and keep enjoying this!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our cleric giggles from Vasselheim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we take a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If there's a time to blow your wad, it's now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's take a... violent shot on top of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Violent shot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I use the violent shot action with the ice damage. Let's see what that does. Natural 20! This is going to be ugly as fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Of course it is!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this is all piercing damage, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god. This is so fucking bad, is what this is about to be. Oh my god, this is going to be so-- let me get these additional dice. Okay, so let's start doing this. Do all of the dice rolls get doubled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of the dice for this roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All of the dice for this roll. Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll the dice and then double it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: High rolls. Big money, no whammies. It could be worse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counts quietly) 42 points of damage plus eight points of ice damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every shot you've taken on her in particular. That ends your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I get my grit point back from that because that was a natural 20, so that was a free shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When do you reload, by the way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's hit her in the legs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 20 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 to hit. This is with your minus five? Are you taking a sharpshooter shot on this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. 20 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, 20 total to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Okay, so that does hit, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because she has her disadvantage. She needs to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: DC equals eight plus my proficiency mod plus my dexterity mod.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus ten, so 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She made it. She didn't fall, but she still takes some damage, so let's see what she does. Ten, 12, 22, 28 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And because this is really annoying me, I'm going to give her a gut shot. Torso shot. Same thing, sharpshooter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm seeing this all in slow motion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Throwing bullets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 27 points of damage. And she has a disadvantage on strength and dexterity checks for the rest of the round. For one full round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to back up a little bit, for the rest of my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get out of her view?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. That ends your turn, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra, seeing all this go down and having this crisis moment, picks up her sword, rushes over, and uses her action to pull out one of the potions that you gave her, the greater healing potion, and feed it to the ailing Briarwood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it, girl!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I gave her one. I gave her a greater.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A greater? We wasted a greater?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a nice guy! I can't resist the charm of a woman, especially one who looks identical to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her wounds close up a little bit. The ear wound heals over a little bit, and she wipes her mouth. "Thank you, dear. Sylas! To the ritual!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a mist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, it's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do it. Do it, girl!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Burn him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I turn and I start shouting to the mist and I say, what's the matter, Sylas? Afraid of a little gnome and a druid? And I blast him with Sunbeam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good line.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) That was the lamest thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth isn't good with lines. Are you afraid of us? I heard Percy try to do lines, and I'm like, that's what badasses do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I guess in this particular instance I want to ask you: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, cursed gun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's still a semi-visible form of his body, but in a mist form. It's trying to slowly escape off the top of this structure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Pike is standing right next to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use Pike and use the light that I have off Pike and combine it to do a joint Sunbeam, holy bomb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's going to eat a bag of holy dicks is what you're saying, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make it sound great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Looking over at Pike, already ready with her mace up in the air and the mist recoiling from her. You glance at each other, have that connective point, and as Pike brings up her shield, you bring back your Sunbeam and throw it towards the shield, arcing it in his direction as she ricochets the reflection of the actual sunlight back at him at the same time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was way cooler than what you said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, way cooler! I knew he'd bring it through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: High five, Pike!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How does it feel, Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She, looking over her shoulder, still looking at him as she's called to him to go join in the altar room, the ritual room, looks over and sees his mist form. In slow motion, from her perspective, she sees Keyleth step forward, wind blowing around her, releasing this beam and watching him be disintegrated. Immediately, her eyes open wide and she screams out, "No! Sylas!" and you can see her whole body shaking now. The horror of seeing her partner, the love of her life, disintegrated before her. Tears immediately burst down her face, and her hands are shaking there as she screams out, "You can't! I broke the world for us! No." That's the end of your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I ask a question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does Cassandra's charm come from Sylas or Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about yours?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From Lady Briarwood, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The lady.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The lady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yours is fine. All right, does that end your turn, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So, with that, it brings us to the top of the initiative round. It is now Lady Delilah Briarwood's turn. Looking around, heaving with anger and frustration, she looks around her area and the tears streak down her face, blood streaking down one side of her head. She looks at Cassandra, who right now is faltering. Seeing everything closing around her, she goes, "It's too "soon, but it's our only chance." And with that, she is going to step around here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somebody hit her. Hit her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's still in combat with you, so you don't get an attack of opportunity. Keyleth, you do, if you want to try and swing towards her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use my sunlight that I have up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have to make a combat strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My staff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trip her!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go for a trip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is just a melee attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got the MVP over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 12 damage! Bam!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crack! You hit her in the back of the head as she stumbles forward and looks about the rest of you. She is using her last 5th-level spell to attempt to cast another Dimension Door, out of the sight of the one who previously dispelled it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I Counterspell that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no visual on her. She is behind the pillar. This time, she knew where you were and was not about to let that happen again. She disappears behind the pillar, and you guys watch her step into the doorway and vanish from sight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's still Hunter's Marked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's Hunter's Marked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have Hex on her, for as long as that lasts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That lasts a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he under the thing, still? Or did it break?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flight lasts for an hour. The potion lasts for an hour, and it's probably been about--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, she's asking if I'm still--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You currently? Yes. Make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on. Big roll. 13 plus nothing is 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over and see your brother down below and is just standing there, his daggers dropped to the ground in front of him, and has been staring into space this entire time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I float down in front of him and slap him across the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like that? Okay. Make another saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You slap, slap. He's taking it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I go over to Vax?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cassandra's still up, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to Remove Curse on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is not considered a curse, so as the spell alleviates its energy into Vax, he still stands there, staring into space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, wait, are we slapping Vax? Let me try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. You said something about a minute before, though, didn't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so a little time goes by and then eventually it wears off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start looking at that door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Cassandra still there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, she is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I grab her by the neck and walk her to the edge of the pyramid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You grab her, lift her. (choking noise)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no! No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drops her weapons as Grog takes her to the edge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, let's not. Let's not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk up to Grog and her, and I face Percy and repeat what Grog said. Why not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he still under her spell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's been here a very long time. Let's just knock her unconscious and let her be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I turn towards her, and I punch her across the jaw as hard as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, with the damage she's taken and the mental shock she's in and the current circumstance, the one hit (whack) clocks her, and she goes unconscious in his grip. Limp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can handcuff her behind her back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do have manacles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put her in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: OTHERS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Greater Restoration her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, can I Greater Restoration on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have another level of that spell?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you cannot. It's a 5th-level spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can save it for later.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take some of the manacles, and I manacle her hands behind her back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's up, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have Greater Restoration?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not on me. Not today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start working with that door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And to be super shitty, I grab a length of rope and wrap it around her ankles and tie it back to her hands so she can't stand up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Sorry, Cassandra. That's going to suck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's got to stay there when she wakes up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Bigby's Hand does last a minute, if you want to keep it maintained. The minute has passed at this time. It's probably going to pass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, before it passes, it gives me a quick deep-tissue massage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pick up Sylas's onyx sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What does a common healing potion do, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll require a short rest to attune and get the nature of it, but it is a very beautiful new weapon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I'll put it in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You picked up his sword? Good. That's why I had him drop it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I noticed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So he wouldn't disintegrate with it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and so one of us, possibly me, could use it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have a better sword than your piece of shit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to find her. She's somewhere close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll give him the sword. He's got the onyx sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a brooch also left on the ground from the ashes left behind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll pick it up and look at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. These items will take a little time to look over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll look at it for a whole ten seconds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get my strength back, by the way? I'm just down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see, from being on the roof, what's inside the building? You said there's no roof to that temple I was up on top of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a central platform that rises up in the middle. There is a stairway on the opposite side of the room that leads up to that platform, and there are a series of grooves in the ground that form some sort of shape that you can't make out from this viewpoint. You do see Lady Briarwood atop that platform right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's inside the temple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go in. I took a minor healing potion. Is that 2d8?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A minor? A regular one is 2d4 plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, I'll trade you one. I trade him a greater for a common. I take the common.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the greater do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Greater is 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I drop the rope down from the roof where I'm at, so everybody can get up in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Get up and over? Yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It'll take you a while to do that. As you drop the rope--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if you want to try the doors, but I just thought we could get in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you lower the rope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk up to my sister and take her hand and squeeze it as hard as I can, and just walk forward with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you do notice out of the corner of your eye as you lower the rope, there is a flash of greenish light from the center platform, and from the distance, you can see Delilah is up on the platform reading from some sort of scroll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's about 80 feet from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull out Bad News.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of you guys can see her. Only she sees her. You guys are still on the ground. She's on the roof.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lowered the rope so you guys can start climbing up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm climbing up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I see her, if I've gone up to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're the first one to climb up. She just lowered the rope, so you're finding your way up now. You haven't even seen her yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice all the ice on the walls shatters and clinks to the ground. You can hear the sound of a million little shards of ice clinking onto the ground and you can see the walls almost seem like they're moving or writhing slightly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. Can I shoot at her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, get up the fucking rope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm heading straight up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your range increment for your longbow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll look it up under the equipment section in the book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't say on the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start throwing as soon as I'm near my sister.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Vax. Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't throw 80 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, but I could get closer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you can't. We're on the roof around it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A real man could throw 80 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true, Grog. That's true. That's a good point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it's 120 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 150 feet, so yeah. There's no serious issue there. You can go ahead. You have disadvantage on the strike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because her image is still shimmering.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great, then 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Arrow (whoosh) disappears into the darkness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I hit her again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the relationship to her, if I've just gotten next to her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She was married to Sylas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, shut up, you. Where are we, and where is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so if you want to come up to the top and start looking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god! That looks like a big hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a Bigby Hand!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what they say about guys with Bigby Hands?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bigby Gloves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 was the second arrow that I shot at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? 20 would hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, are you up there yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we on the edge of a ledge or a wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a ledge that goes around the entire wall that encases this, but there's no roof. It's just an open square area. So you would get up to there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go up next?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I maybe go through the piece of paper that she's reading?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would've been something to call before you shot her. Next attack you can, if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you said Jennifer Lopez is 80 feet from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roughly, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I head up, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 damage to her is what I rolled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, as that hits, she reaches into her pocket and pulls something out. Percy, you get to the top there. Who's up next?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm always behind Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the rest of you gather at the bottom here. Trinket's going to have a hard time getting up there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take 80 feet--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, before that happens, as a reaction to that, she pulls something out of her hand. There's a streak of red light that arcs upward, and there's a slight shrieking sound as a familiar arcane blast hits, a Fireball bursts on the roof area around all of you. (explosion noise) I need a dexterity saving throw from all three of you guys up there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's up there right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we get advantage on it at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15. Can I use Uncanny Dodge at this moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mean to lower that damage by half?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, is she casting a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can also use Evasion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You failed the save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, but depending on what it is. Those both do different things. Okay, they do the same thing. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. All right, so saving throws for Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 for your dex?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a 15, so half damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you take half damage. That is 36 points of fire damage to you. That would be 18 to both of you guys. 18 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Another 18 points of fire damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just to them. You took full damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, next person at the rope?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, you make your way up to the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I fire now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's 80 feet? It's within the Pepperbox range. I'm going to shoot for the scroll with fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, good call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That rolled really low. I can use that bonus die. I rolled within my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misfire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The natural roll is still what counts for misfire, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
