lines.text: I'm going to try and fix it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pepperbox is broken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have I recovered at all to shoot again? Have I recovered enough to shoot at her again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will in a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pepperbox is completely broken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, unusable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, if only we had another gun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait. We do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bad News.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we have another gun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have two more guns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have Ripley's gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give it to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you up on top?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't give it to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I still have-- are we still--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have one more attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bad News.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll get Bad News out. That's it. All right, with that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're very good at this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it. I just want to say you're very good at this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (giggles, sighs) We're running a little late. Trying to get through this climactic moment, guys. Apologies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we running late?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crew hates us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the scroll (fluttering noise) vanishes. She, as a bonus action at the top of this turn, gashes across her wrist and spreads her own life's blood across what looks to be this dark orb, about a foot in diameter, that's resting in the center of this upper platform.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take a potion really fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top of your turn, you can, as a bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The orb is floating?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dark orb in the center of the platform that she's currently on in the center of this room. It's half-embedded in the ground, and she scatters her blood across it. You can see her shaking with fear and trepidation during this whole circumstance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She splatters her blood on the dark sphere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, those who are up top, by the way. Who's up next?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jesus Christ. 16.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we trying to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception. Scanlan gets up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey. Hi, guys! What's going-- oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's bleeding all over that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, there's an orb coming up from where?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The center of the pedestal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The center of the platform she's on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's got blood on it. She's doing a magic ritual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're how high in the air from the floor that she's on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you're about 30 feet up. She's about 40 feet up. She's actually risen a little above you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to guzzle a potion, and then I'm going to shoot Percy's special arrow, question mark? At the orb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the orb? You're not going to stop this with an arrow. It's happened already. It's done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I go to the very edge, how far am I from her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then what am I supposed to do? Killing her, what good will it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 55 feet away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe she's a sacrifice, at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's within range, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of your daggers?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm throwing, then, at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the throwing dagger range?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 feet, because I'm sharpshooter, so I take no disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I don't like her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20/60, so yeah, you can still hit her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm going to throw two daggers at her. I don't know if there's any poison left-- I'm sure there's not-- on the Life-Stealing, and the Keen. First one is not good at all. That's a 14, and the second one hits. That's a 28. That is the Life-Stealing. That is seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had said I was going to shoot the orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to shoot the special arrow, question mark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, you're left-handed, and she apparently has things against lefties.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, exactly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You flicked me in the left nut. Are you complicit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? Okay. That does hit the orb. Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what I'm doing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the arrow streaks off and seemingly hits the orb. Splinters across the surface.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was the arrow, question mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it was the explosive one? Oh, okay. The arrow arcs off. Did you roll with disadvantage on that one because it is the explosive arrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. No. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. The arrow whizzes past and slams into the bottom of the pillar. You see a muffled explosion and light flash, and it rocks the center a bit, but she still maintains concentration. She looks over at where it came from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I have shot her? I'm sorry. I should have shot her!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine. It wouldn't have done anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try something? Am I able to try something? Is she still bleeding all over this orb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bleeding has finished. The orb is rising up and pulsing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we surprise her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she is well aware of you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's well aware that we're here. Did I go before her? Is there initiative here? Did I go before her turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, as people arrive, I'm counting this. I'll probably do initiative after we finish this set.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I still fly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still fly if you want, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 55 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I going soon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're getting to that now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think this is going to be shot down, and I'm fine if it is, but I know that with Assassinate, if I go before the enemy does, it's an automatic critical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is one of those circumstances where you guys have been already in combat. This isn't a scenario where you got the jump on them. She's aware that you guys are there and she's just trying to finish this while ignoring that circumstance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pull out a fancy robe from my bag and I'm going to try to fly towards the orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While she does that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth's got shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not going to work, but I can try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so you could argue that our bodies are made of 70 percent water, right, so if I cast Control Water, can I move her blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. Her blood has already cast across the orb and it seems to have initiated whatever is part of it. There's not still blood pouring onto it; she scattered across it once.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wiping the blood off probably wouldn't work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's say no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If she rolls really high. Really high.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How good do you feel about a natural 20?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "How good do you feel about a natural 20?" Well, judging by the shit that's been going down today-- fuck it! I already said it. I'm going to do it. I'm going to do Control Water and I'm going to see if I can suck all the blood off of the orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll a d20, add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, did you see that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did. That was cruel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was on a 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then it bounced.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Focusing from this distance, you try to-- The blood shifts across the surface, but there is some sort of power that's holding it to the orb. It is unmoved. I know. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got one shot at this, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to cast-- I can't cast anything anymore. I'm going to try to cast Suggestion on her, and I will say, Stop, collaborate and listen. Because I'm a gnome who's on a mission. Follow me as I kill your husband the lich, and I'll make you my bitch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her husband was a vampire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It didn't rhyme. It's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on. Hail Mary pass, here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Suggestion is a-- oh, she probably can't be charmed. It's a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, she rolled a 19. What's your DC on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good attempt, though, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never mind! Carry on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a shot with Bad News because this is getting really ridiculous. I'm going to try and get her attention and get her to pay attention. Let's have a normal roll. Oh, for the love of God!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One? 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, Bad News--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Misfire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, try and repair it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just barely!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I can try and get one more bullet to come out of it at this point, so I'm going to make one last attempt to make it shoot, after clearing the chamber. Better! Jesus H. Christ. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on. Coup de grace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Coup de grace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is at least going to get her attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a 12 on a d12, which is dope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's 21. 27 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. Taking her turn, she sees you rushing towards her. She extends her finger--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait! I took a potion. I took a potion! I said it on the last turn, and I didn't use it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how much to roll for a greater healing potion. That's why I didn't do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I'm going to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm serious. I'm going to die right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! Shut up. Four and-- pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She extends her finger towards you with a look, and there's this point of recognition, this moment, where you're like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no attack, there's no nothing? There's no roll? I can't Cutting Words this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't Cutting Words?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't Cutting Words the damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a weapon attack, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13, no. All right, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is it. This is it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 45 plus 30. 75 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you were at 76?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, she looks at her finger, frustrated. Glances at the rest of you, and looks forward at the orb and goes, "Come on, come on!" At this point, the orb is now shimmering, and the blood is slowly spilling over the outside of the dark onyx sphere. It begins to spin and spin and spin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I close to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You immediately plummet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I cast Hold Person? On her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to. It's just going to paralyze her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I can't hold her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. So at that height, it's 40 feet. You fall. You take 3d6 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I roll for acrobatics? Maybe I can catch myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Roll acrobatics with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I don't know where a d20 is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20, and? Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acrobatics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take four points of fall damage. As you slam down into the center of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're unconscious on the ground. (thud)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my first time I've ever been unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you were going to die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's still connected to her rope, though, isn't she?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I took out a fancy robe. I was going to trap the globe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whose turn is it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I get to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are up on this roof right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm leaping. If you let me leap, I'm going to leap and take an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acrobatics check, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20. Natural fucking 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Landing on your feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Parkour!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a potion with my sister's name written on it, and it's going in her mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you get on your movement, right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. You can kill her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you rush up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your full movement to get to her. You can't do anything else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I can't do anything else? I can't do a bonus action? I can't do nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can do a bonus action, but it's an action to feed a potion to somebody else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm throwing a knife at Lady Briarwood, which I can use a bonus action to attack her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the ground, you can't see her. She's 40 feet up on the platform. She's completely out of your visual sight. You're down inside this hand groove that's dug in the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck. All right, I'll hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's up next? Who wants to go next?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I get to her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on top of the roof. You're going to have to leap down to get to her. You're too far away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's got time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you could try a spell if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try a spell if you want to. She's about 50 feet from you, at an angle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll do a Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you pull up your holy symbol and begin casting the spell, the divine energy seems to be pulled from your hand, and the spell has no effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So magic doesn't work?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it because we're in this fucking room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to stay where you are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on down. Let's party.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you've gotten up now, with the rope, to the top. Anybody else want to go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a shot at Lady Briarwood, since I'm up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. And you aren't forgetting your Hex damage on her, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was. I forgot it on the last one. I remembered that I forgot it. That's 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 13, 14, 15, 16-- 22 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get to kill Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it with as little blood as possible. I'm dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think, if you kill her--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a little late.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here comes Godzilla.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The smoke billowing from your body, the essence of this creature whispering in your ear, "Now. Do it. Do it!" Bad News, freshly repaired, loaded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's your birthright.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take-- oh my god. I'm going to take a shoulder shot on her right arm, and I'm going to try to cleave her right arm right off with the shot and see if I can leave her unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll damage. This is going to be a constitution saving throw for her, if she can survive this wound as (gun blast)-- the right or left arm, you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact noises) Falls off the steps, falls out of sight behind the pillar. You don't even see where she is. She falls out of visual range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know if she's unconscious or dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to circle around to her right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to try to heal me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I know. Oh, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to heal me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I am. Fuck that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I jump down, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm feeding a potion to my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acrobatics check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, okay. You land and take ten points of damage from the fall. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's at the door going, (sad bear noises).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's trying to get in on this side. All right, Percy's gone. Scanlan, do you want to try anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can move within 30 feet of Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to get on the ground to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an acrobatics check, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. Okay, so you only take three points of damage from the fall. You don't fall prone. Okay, so going full movement from there, you can get there. Grog, full movement. Where are you going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to go straight for Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex? Okay, that would get you right there, with your movement. And then Keyleth--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going for the black thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will have to go around and go up these steps to get to it. With full double movement, that will put you about there. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you pop off the vial, you go and pop it into her mouth and take the vial away. There doesn't appear to be any effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With no talk of death saves at all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get her out of the room. Get out of the room!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a death saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get me out of here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do we get her-- Keyleth, we need vines! 11, that's a success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're okay for now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck that bitch! We need to get my sister out of this room. Keyleth, can we use vines? What can we use to get my sister out of this room now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll pick her up and start running towards the door at the back of the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What door is open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Neither.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to get her up and out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do the doors look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't tell from here. You're too far, and the doors are on this side and this side, and they were closed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, do you have a rope?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She has the rope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull the rope out from my sister's side and I start lassoing it-- fuck that-- throw it up to Percival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a couple of tries, but you manage to get to the 40-foot top there. Make another death saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm tying it to my sister right now. Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fail. I've tied it around my sister. Pike, Percy, pull!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to grab the rope, and I am literally just going to jump off the side and I'm going to fling her up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You might miss, and hurt her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's already dead!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, before you do this: have we tried a Healing Word on her?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of damage from the fall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll run to the door that's closest to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to get her up to the top. Grog, you're the one who has her right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike, please help her!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. We've got to get her out of here, or nothing's going to work, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull her out the door and heal her! It will work.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, let me try to pull her out the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you pulled her up onto the roof.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might work on the roof.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try it up on the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Try on the roof.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Healing Word again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're touching her. You're near her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, I'm touching her? Cure Wounds!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cursing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull her out of here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another death saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) Oh my god, I'm going to die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're not going to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12. Save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're saved!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull her out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's on top of the wall here. She's been lifted out by Grog and Percival.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm running at the wall and I'm trying to climb it, stupidly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll a climb check. Roll athletics.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the little penny? The dime?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? (grunts) You get partway up. You climb over bodies. You're using the bodies on the wall to climb up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I throw Vax something real quick? Can I toss him something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move up and do it, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, before he runs that way. Can I toss you the Immovable Rod?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't even pay attention. He bolts past, towards the wall. He's already out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never mind. I'm trying to get to this black hole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get up there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try Divine Intervention right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your full turn. You want to do Divine Intervention?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d10 and then another d10, and let me know the numbers in succession.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are what level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, that just fails.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scream at the top of my lungs, pull her out of here! I'm still climbing dead bodies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got hold of the rope and just trying to yell, toss her off! Because that way we can see if we can counterweight her back down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at the top, so we can gently get her down. I could jump down with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll jump and hold her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll ride the rope up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're on the same side as them jumping down now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's right. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They would come down to meet you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have I reached the top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say now you've managed to climb up towards the top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to pick up Pike under my arm like a fucking football and run forward after my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab her and bolt off the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once we hit the ground-- we're outside of the room, right? Should we try to heal her? I've got a common.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's going to be 14 points of fall damage to you as you land because right now you're not carefully landing. This is just clutching her and jumping off. You, make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? Okay. You manage to take only two damage from the fall. Make another death saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe in you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Save. I've only failed one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm planting Pike's glowing form right down on my sister's chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I put a common? I have a common.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did succeed three times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She succeeded three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three times. No, you succeeded--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Twice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three times. Yeah, so with that, as you're carrying her there, there's a moment where all of a sudden, Vex's eyes open and (deep breath). Vex is sitting there, looking around, confused, catching her breath in Grog's arms as he's bolting down the steps of the ziggurat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, you smell terrible. (chuckles weakly)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should get out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do something to that little ball.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm alone with the little ball, aren't I? Okay, I'm going to go up to it. Can I tell any type of magical properties from it from looking at it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. Oh, that's good! 19 total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 total. You have no idea what this is. You haven't seen something like this before. You inspect it very closely, and it's literally like the sphere has been shrunk to this size. You look very closely and it looks like it's spinning impossibly fast in place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's still in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in there. I go up there, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Check on Lady Shithead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah? Okay, I'm going to turn back and go to check out Lady Shithead. I don't know why I'm still in this room. We should get out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and open the doors from that side to see if there's any way to open them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is the net of dead bodies doing? Are they limp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just limp. Still in the tapestry, arms fallen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? Doors aren't budging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here, you take your sister. I'll go back to the doors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go back to the doors and try the doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Strength check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try to Cure Wounds again, on Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You run up to Vex as she's in Vax's arms. Once again, the spell slot is expended, but no magic seems to appear. There is some sort of blockage or void of magic use in this vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even outside of this building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? (impact noise) The doors slam open from the force of Grog's foot, opening the passageway inside the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would my Sunbeam still be up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's passed, for now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make my way over to Scanlan to go check on Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You eventually make your way there at a full run. You run around the corner and you can see her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Alive? Dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is on the ground, unconscious, sitting in this carved hand symbol in the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we want this girl alive for some reason? I can't move her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to figure out what we're doing with the little black ball of universal death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get her out of there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just get us out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could we just leave it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Can you put it in a vial?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put it in a vial?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out a piece of that green glass that we took from before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's smart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give it a poke.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to jam it into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just hit the black hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take the glass and jam it in there, the glass, in what seems almost like slow-mo, seems to crackle and shatter like brittle stone, and immediately vanish into the darkness. As your hand gets to that point of no resistance, you feel this immediate, extremely strong suction begin to pull towards your hand, and you yank back with all your might, suffering 18 points of damage as you (grunts) pull away from this small spinning orb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so maybe we don't touch the orb anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't touch the orb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing happened to it? Still just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still just sitting there. A little speck in space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not leaving this thing.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: What do you mean we're not leaving it?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we going to do to it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's indestructible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're obviously not equipped. I'll grab Lady Briarwood and drag her out of the room towards the doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what's that-- the horn of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Orcus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Horn of Orcus? Can that counter-- we don't have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to put the two bad things together?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, maybe they'll become a good thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two negatives make a positive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what I say to all my women.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what's going on, but I've got her and I'm hugging her from behind and turning my back towards whatever is in that room. I don't know what's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try and tear this whole building down. I still have my elemental shape. I can go earth elemental and start ripping this thing apart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bury it like the pharaohs of old?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Why not? Let's get out of here. Do you want to take Briarwood with us, or bury her in the rubble?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't kill her in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm afraid of what blood will do to that thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She kept talking about a sacrifice. We can't kill her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think she was going to jump into that orb?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think she understood she had to give a life for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think something was going to come through that orb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's drag her out of here. Percy, you can shoot her in the head a hundred yards from here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then you can bury it once we're out of the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I drag her out of the room and toward the steps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're holding her in your arms, what's everyone doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone, get out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm picking up my sister and lurching after Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can walk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm picking you up, and I'm lurching after Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as Grog rushes down the steps of the ziggurat, clutching the unconscious and bleeding body of Lady Delilah Briarwood. Vax rushing behind, carrying the barely-conscious, limp body of Vex'ahlia, the rest of you racing out. You, your hand bloodied from the terrible force of whatever that was. You go charging down the steps of the ziggurat. Is anyone taking Cassandra, or are you leaving her behind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking Cassandra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach over and pick up Cassandra, put her over your shoulder, and you begin racing down the front of the ziggurat steps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I tearing this place down?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not yet. Not until we're out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll stay behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stay behind?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have to be there to do it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Being an earth elemental and ripping it apart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's doing it physically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's all get to the point where it's not going to collapse on us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we just open up the acid and let it pour down in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so far away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to go that way, anyway. Once we get there, let's open the spigot, point it towards the doors, and let it do its work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if that's enough acid to take down and destroy a thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Might as well try it. Do we have any acid? You have acid, can we pour it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like three little acid vials.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got acid from a tube.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we just seal up the hole and get out of here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get out of here. Keyleth, it's a good idea. Destroy the temple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do some damage to the temple, and then once we're all the way out, we'll open the acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to leave a spinning black hole of death under the city?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could just swallow the entire city and everybody could die. This is my problem, at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be okay. I'll meet you there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can earth shape. She'll be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I push my sister into Grog's massive arms because he can hold fucking five people, and I start running back towards the ziggurat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm laying on top of Lady Briarwood right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes, you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 70 percent of her, at the very least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stand at the top of the temple, and I wait to see them go out of range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They all begin to step down the bottom of the stairs, except for Vax, who begins running back up the steps towards you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax, go. No. Go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever you're going to do, just fucking do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I concentrate for a minute, and I go into the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you focus your attention towards your earthen core and triggering the transformation effect, nothing happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Magic. It kills all magic!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even Beast Shape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a magical transformation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck it! Run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you try pouring acid on the thingy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do it once we're out. We're just going to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I rolled a one right as that final.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For no reason.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We killed the Briarwoods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, one and a half of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We didn't die. Yet.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't believe I almost died again from that damn death ray!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By one point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So if you had rolled 76 points of necrotic damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She'd have been dead instantly and then come back as a zombie in the next round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And would become what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I hadn't taken that potion right before I leapt off--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have been dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank god you took that fucking potion!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That went a little longer than anticipated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a bad man! [no audio] (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Pike's playlist is up right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Percy? How much does that comic cost?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That comic is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Free.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was free. After this weekend, it's one healing potion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That won't work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A bunch of wasted healing potions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, guys. Thank you all so much for your patience, for your diligence, for watching this extremely--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (mock-crying) Is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, god.
